required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cyanophyta Aphanizomenon Flos-aquae, and Adipose Stroma Vascular Fraction, in Heart Failure Patient
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Cyanophyta Aphanizomenon Flos-aquae (Stemregen), and Adipose Stroma Vascular Fraction (SVF) Either Individual or in Combination in Patient With Heart Failure

lead_sponsor.agency: Sociedad Española de Medicina Regenerativa y Terapia Celular

clinical_study.source: Sociedad Española de Medicina Regenerativa y Terapia Celular

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a prospective, randomized, controlled trial to assess the efficacy of transplantation of autologous stroma vauscultar fraction and/or AFA in 15 patients with ischemic heart failure

detailed_description.textblock: Stem cells therapy may be a choice therapy for advanced heart failure patients refractory to medical therapy, and a previous history of coronary artery diseases. In this study the investigators have evaluated consecutive 15 selected patients, the amelioration in failing heart NYHA class, hospitalization rate, echocardiographic left ventricle functionality, serum of Natriuretic peptide level and associated to reduction of angina after a treatment with stroma vascular fraction infusion y/or Stemregen capsule per oral.

primary_outcome.measure: Change NYHA functional class assessed with SAQ-7 -questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: The improvement in patient's quality of life after 6 months of trial admission. The quality of life will be determined with Seattle Angina Questionnaire 7 (SAQ-7). Each domain has a score calculated on a scale of 0 (= worst health quality) to 100 (= best health quality)

primary_outcome.measure: Change of echocardiographic Parameters [ Time Frame: 0 and 6 months ]
primary_outcome.description: Left Ventricular end-systolic volume index (LVESVI) Left Ventricular end-systolic dimension Left Ventricular end-diastolic volume Left Ventricular end-diastolic dimension. [ Time Frame: 6 months from trial admission]

secondary_outcome.measure: Change NYHA functional class assessed with SAQ-7 -questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: The improvement in patient's quality of life after 12 months of trial admission. The quality of life will be determined with Seattle Angina Questionnaire 7 (SAQ-7). Each domain has a score calculated on a scale of 0 (= worst health quality) to 100 (= best health quality).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of echocardiographic Parameters [ Time Frame: 0 and 12 months ]
secondary_outcome.description: Left Ventricular end-systolic volume index (LVESVI) Left Ventricular end-systolic dimension Left Ventricular end-diastolic volume Left Ventricular end-diastolic dimension, [ Time Frame: 12 months from trial admission]

arm_group.description: Patient using conventional therapy plus Extract of the Cyanophyta Aphanizomenon Flos-aquae (AFA), for a period of 6 months
Patient using conventional therapy plus aplication of stroma vascular fraction (SVF) from the adipose tissue, evaluted for period of 6 months

arm_group.arm_group_label: conventional therapy plus SVF and AFA
arm_group.description: Patient using conventional therapy plus aplication of stroma vascular fraction (SVF) from the adipose tissue plus Extract of the Cyanophyta Aphanizomenon Flos-aquae (AFA), for a period of 6 months

intervention.intervention_name: Water-soluble Extract of the Cyanophyta Aphanizomenon Flos-aquae (AFA),
intervention.description: Patient use 2 capsules 3 time a day by oral.
intervention.arm_group_label: conventional therapy plus SVF and AFA

intervention.description: After filling up the informed consent Mini liposuction is performed under local anesthesia with klein solution, about 70 cc of dry fat tissue is suctioned and collagenase digestion is done with final centrifugation to obtain the SVF
intervention.arm_group_label: conventional therapy plus SVF and AFA

study_pop.textblock: 15 patients age from 35 to 80 yers old

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- EF < 45 %
- NYHA 2 - 3
Exclusion Criteria:
- Acute coronary syndrome within last 6 weeks.
- Pregnancy
- FEV1 <20 %
- Cancer
- Any severe disease which could interfere with the treatment or the outcome
- Patient with immunodeficiency
- Candidate who are judged to be not applicable to this study by doctors.
